website_summaries.verdict: Digital controls add value and simplicity to this basic radiant heater.
pros: Includes remote control and digital display
Doesn't get hot to the touch
Good for rooms with children and pets

customer_reviews.title: Safe and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Have three this style. Love that they don’t blow hot air and add to winter dryness. Reduces risk of fire. Very effective for heating bedroom, bathroom or other enclosed area. Also great for targeted heat, put one near my dogs’ kennels in stairwell and keeps their corner warm. Moves easily. Remote and timer are very convenient. Save money on heating bills in larger houses by just heating where you need it. Would be great in a garage as well.
customer_reviews.author: GHJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. I had another similar one for 10 years. It was so hard to set. This was a welcome relief
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great unit!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I appreciate the eco mode. The only cons are the beep on changing settings is really loud and the remote doesn't have very good range/ limited angles it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewjc88

customer_reviews.title: Worked until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a little over a year, didn't use it all summer 2018 or summer 2019 & now it won't turn on. Shuts itself off uhhh so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa MVM

customer_reviews.title: THE HEATER IS VERY CLEAN AND EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE AND CONVENIENT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY USEFUL AND EXTREMELY NECESSARY FOR MY SELF, CONTROL TO MY EXPECTATIONS AND I ENJOY HOW IT KEEPS MY ROOM WARM!!! THANK YOU 🙏🏽!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hunny

customer_reviews.title: Warms my winters :)
customer_reviews.text: This is great, energy efficient, heats up quickly, love the remote, great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Nitasha Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Love  it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 as back up to electric furnace in the country.
customer_reviews.author: Athenah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it smelled a little bit when i turned it on the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This is junk,, turns on but will not heat, Don't buy it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.....
customer_reviews.text: This will not even heat a 20x20 room with a closed door. It is absolutely a pile of junk!!! If someone would not have ripped the box apart and thworn it away I would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but noisy
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and extremely easy to program/use remote control. However! It's noisy!!! The materials make a cracking noise when hearing or cooling. And the remote control beeper is very loud, so you'll wake up your partner if using it to change settings during the night.
customer_reviews.author: NAH

customer_reviews.title: Great room heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great room heater and nearly silent (it does make an unexpected loud noise but this is rare). It's extremely easy to use and I love that it can be programmed to turn off or on (2 - 10 hr).
customer_reviews.author: SonyaJ

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing heater. Heating an addition to my house that is 20x20x10 and has windows on 3 sides. Keeps it toasty on its lowest setting. Love the remote too. Works only in line of sight but that's fine
customer_reviews.author: RCX

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom, she loves it! It provides plenty of heat for her tv room.
customer_reviews.author: Rem

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This heater is extremely quiet, and I love the timer feature, which you can set it 2 hour increments or continuous heat. The wheels were very easy to put on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. It keeps the room warm and toasty. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Mom approves it heater
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom who lives in chilly small house, keeps the bedroom nice during the night.
customer_reviews.author: In Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Lil heavy but the temp setting is where it is at to not over heat urself.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Newman

customer_reviews.title: Defective product - serious fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: I was using the heater in the living room for less than 4 hours at 80F, and it overheated. I smelled a burnt smell, and later found out the plug of the heater almost completely melted. My wall outlet is also burned. This is a serious fire hazard. I am very concerned - it could have set my house on fire if I wasn't paying close attention to it. I want my money back or some sort of remedy. However, I could not even find the contact information for this brand. I am very unhappy with the non-existent customer service and the defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Jingjing Zha

customer_reviews.title: Unique heating
customer_reviews.text: I am familiar with oil filed heaters as use for our sulcate tortoise. They are a safe, effective way to heat. Simple to put the roller wheels on, just use the enclosed wing nuts. Takes a few minutes to get the oil heated but then you will notice a gentle warmth emanating from all around the unit. No harsh blowing or noise, you will sleep like a baby. Does a really good job heating a rather large room I have it in. These are truly cool heaters. They aren't exactly sleek and attractive but total function.
customer_reviews.author: PasoCreek

customer_reviews.title: fits our purpose
customer_reviews.text: we don't use this unit to heat any room in our house, but rather a small unconditioned side attic just off the room over the garage. we place it here only when overnight temps go below freezing because we don't want to risk another water pipe burst, which was fixed with upgraded insulation. the unit was was easy to assemble and has plastic caster wheels for rolling. operation is easy; we don't use the remote. for our purpose, we don't set the target temp high at all; but just enough to keep the space above freezing. because we don't ask much of it, i'm thinking it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: SAr

customer_reviews.title: Poor heat
customer_reviews.text: For the size of this heater, you would expect it to heat a decent sized area, but that is not the case. It doesnt do a good job at all. It reminds me more of something you would use as a small personal space heater, except that it's a full size heater. I got one of those as seen on heaters that you plug into the wall and it just stays there on the wall and it does a better job to heat a normal sized bedroom than this full size heater does. Strange. On top of that, the unit itself gets very hot, so it seems like a hazard.
customer_reviews.author: MyPenName

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: We've had a similar heater for years and love it. I hoped to use this one as a supplement so we wouldn't have to keep moving the other one around. Unfortunately that didn't work out. This unit simply doesn't put out enough heat. It's good if you are within 2 feet, but outside of that it didn't seem to do much. In addition the plug got very hot, making me worry about how safe it is. I'd avoid this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does a decent job and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This works well in the small room I have it in. I think it might take to long to heat a large room. It is not as good at getting the room warm when it is cold and damp but depending where in the room it is (not near a drafty window) it does a nice job of keeping the room comfortable. It looks nice and does not take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use and does not get overly hot
customer_reviews.text: Really like that this isn't going to burn my children or pets because it doesn't get too hot in any one location. It heats up quickly and stays warm for a long time. It does use a lot of energy, but that's pretty much any space heater. Really like it for back rooms in our home that don't get enough heat.
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: 100% efficient eletric heater with a remote heats a good-sized room
customer_reviews.text: All electric heater are 100% efficient because all of the electricity is turned into heat. This oil-filled heater provides radiant heat and is quiet. I like the digital display and the ability to control it with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: ElVaporizer

customer_reviews.title: Don't live in a cold climate without one
customer_reviews.text: This oil-filled machine is a workhorse. it's is completely silent and fills the room with a warm radiance that is unlike any other kind of heater. You have to think a little differently with this one. Plan ahead. IF you're going to take a shower in a cold bathroom put this on about an hour earlier. Of Course, i keep the temperature set and just keep it on. There are so many good reasons for this to be in your bathroom including how it warms your towels while you're bathing. don't hesitate this thing is a beauty and so efficient it makes us laugh at how much our little fan forced space heater used to cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H ✨

customer_reviews.title: Great heater, missing good timing features
customer_reviews.text: This heater is like any other 3kW oil heater - it does the trick. Unlike others, it produces virtually no smell after the initial turn on cycle. My only complaint is that the timer is a hours to remain on timer (great for an office setting), but I'd like to set the heater to come on at 6 AM and turn off at 5 PM. With this model I just have to wait until I arrive to turn it on. Other that the timing not working for my ideal situation, it's a solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leeman

customer_reviews.title: Puts out lots of heat and remote is convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've used many oil-filled heaters over the years and this unit is by far the most convenient one that I've had. The display is easy to read, remote is easy to use, and the heater puts out a decent amount of heat. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Geek

customer_reviews.title: Keeps a laundry room comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I live in a little house built 120 years ago. The heating system is inadequate. I've been using this little radiant unit to keep my laundry room at a comfortable temperature and to ensure that the water pipes in that location don't freeze. The feet are easy to put on, the remote works well, and the unit's display panel is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Penfist

customer_reviews.title: Out of hte box ready to go
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to do but plug it in and go. Casters make it easy to move around (it's lightweight anyways), and the remote gives you ease of controlling from bed or at your desk. Great price for a way to keep that room at a comfy temp!
customer_reviews.author: Texas K's

product_meta.title: Hurricane Radiant Heater | Digital Display w/ Remote Control
product_meta.description: The Hurricane Heatwave Whole Room Digital Radiant Heater is a whole room oil-filled radiant style heater. The radiant style heater maximizes the amount of radiant heat while ensuring a low surface temperature, which makes this an excellent choice for children and pets. Digital display includes 3 heat settings, portable wheeled design, and 1500 watts of heating power. Includes remote control. ETL Listed. 1 Year Warranty.
feature_bullets: The Hurricane Whole Room Digital Radiant Heater is a whole room oil-filled radiant heater.
The radiant style heater maximizes the amount of radiant heat. The radiant style heater ensures a low surface temperature.
Digital display with 3 heat settings (Hi, Lo, Eco Modes), Timer Display, and a portable design.
1500 watts of heating power. ETL Listed and 1 Year Warranty
Easy Assembly Required - Remote Control Included and Requires AAA Batteries (Not Included).

specifications.Item model number: With Remote Control and Digital Display
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
